name: Palace & Puzzles
description:
Palace & Puzzles is a refreshing combination of a palace simulation, match-3 battles, and character development. Along with these, it also has exciting PvP duels, bringing players a brand-new experience with match-3 battles and immersive character development.

Here you will rule your own kingdom and experience the royal life of the Middle Ages. You will be immersed in irresistible romance, empire management, and political conspiracy in the exciting journey of a king.

GAME FEATURES

Be the King and Rule Your Kingdom!
-A huge empire is now under your control!

Handle Your Domestic Affairs Carefully!
-You will be the final judge of all that happens in this kingdom!

Royal Balls
-Romantic royal balls await you, along with mysterious romance. Will you meet the person that you are longing to see? Absolutely.

Raise Your Heirs
-Raise children with your beloved character and watch them grow!

Match-3
-Conquer the land and take the throne with a few taps of your fingertips! One more round for the King?

Hero Recruitment
-Legendary heroes will join you! Hundreds of epic champions are here for you to lead! Lancelot, Merlin, and Vivian will fight alongside you!

Thrilling PvP
Top player battles are here in Palace & Puzzle. Challenge top players from around the world!

Have you ever wondered, as a new king who has just ascended the throne, how to strategize and navigate conspiracy and rebellions, securing your throne? Fortunately, there are many beautiful heroines who will help you to realize your great cause!

Become a king now!
